text:
Alchemy Kids Theatre, will conduct drawing and colouring, oratorical and dramatics contests for school students of Tiruchi and Thanjavur. The drawing competition would be held at the respective schools between January 25 and February in junior (standards I and II) and senior (standards III to V) categories. Five best speakers nominated by each participating school under each category will contest in first round of oratorical competition to be held in Tiruchi on January 27 and in Thanjavur on January 29. The oratorical competition in English and Tamil is open for students of standards VI to VIII.

The dramatics competition (group performance) in English and Tamil is open for students of standards IX to XII. One best team (of not more than 10 participants) nominated by schools under each category will contest in the first round to be held on January 28 in Tiruchi and on January 30 in Thanjavur. The finals of oratorical and dramatics competitions will be held on February 6 in Thanjavur, according to a press release.

The last date for registration for the competitions is January 21. For details log on to www.alchemykids.com or call 9841047620.
title: Drawing and colouring contests
